name: Dragon Twist
description:
Your dragon is hungry! Use your strategy skills to avoid the fire balls in Dragon Twist!

Become the most long-standing dragon eating little luminous circles while avoiding a spinning orb on fire!

Slither, crawl, spin and move around in this addictive game! You will need to control the dragon's speed and play against the dangerous orb on fire until you emerge victorious. Tame your dragon and become the best player in this survival adventure!

Imagine being a hungry slither dragon won´t be easy! This game mixes speed with strategy: Once you start playing Dragon Twist, your dragon will be spinning on circles eating luminous balls. The goal of Dragon Twist is to control the speed of your dragon in order not to touch the orb on fire while continue eating luminous balls in an endless mode full of challenges!

• 12 different playable dragons with unique features: Choose the character which fits best to you in this amazing game!
• Train to slither and spin faster and further in this exciting game
• Endless survival mode with increasing difficulty: Eat luminous balls and gain points spinning as if you were in a dragon dance!
• Intuitive game controls and rules
• Awesome dragons and cool graphics
• Designed for every mobile device

Control your dragon around a dark space, eat luminous balls and last longer than any other player: It´s time to start playing and slithering in Dragon Twist!
How long do you think you can you last!?
This universe full of adventure, firing balls and magic awaits! Bring dragons back to life in Dragon Twist!
